subject: High toll costs
description_text:
Hello,
I recently bought a set of pedals and paid for express shipping. Now i have
recieeved an email from ups that i have to pay around 70€ extra to recieve
my package. It was never stated on your website that orders are subject to
import fees.

Kind regards,
Nils Meinow

conversations.body_text: Hi Nils Meinow,     Since our prices do not include customs duties by default, we will ship from the EU (Germany) warehouse if stock is available there; otherwise, the order will be shipped from China. That said, even with potential import duties, our products remain an excellent value for money.      https://www.simsonn.com/tools/faq
